glsa.title: Xerces-C++: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xerces-C++, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Xerces-C++ is a validating XML parser written in a portable subset of C++.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xerces-C++. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted file, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Xerces-C++ users should upgrade to the latest version:
